R

Remote - Interface in agilermi
 
RmiDispositionException - Exception in agilermi
Thrown when an RmiHandler instance has been disposed before or during the invocation.
RmiDispositionException() - Constructor for exception agilermi.RmiDispositionException
 
RmiHandler - Class in agilermi
 
RmiHandler(Socket, RmiRegistry) - Constructor for class agilermi.RmiHandler
Constructs a new ObjectPeer over the connection specified by the given socket, with the specified ObjectRegistry.
RmiRegistry - Class in agilermi
Defines a simple class that accepts new TCP connections over a port of the local machine and automatically creates and manages the object sockets to export remote objects.
RmiRegistry() - Constructor for class agilermi.RmiRegistry
 
RmiRegistry(int) - Constructor for class agilermi.RmiRegistry
Creates a new Object server with a new empty object registry
RmiRegistry(int, boolean, ServerSocketFactory, SocketFactory) - Constructor for class agilermi.RmiRegistry
 
RmiRegistry(int, boolean, ServerSocketFactory, SocketFactory, boolean) - Constructor for class agilermi.RmiRegistry
Creates a new Object server with a new empty object registry
